content.question: Which of the following describes a factor of production that is not fully scarce and that can be used simultaneously in the production of more than one good?

choices.label: Machines that can produce both clothing and bedsheets
Unskilled labor needed to produce all goods
Basic knowledge that enhances the organization of all manufacturing assembly lines
Land that is cultivated for two crops by more than one farmer
Labor that has received enhanced training in assembly-line work

content.answer: Basic knowledge that enhances the organization of all manufacturing assembly lines
